channel.title: Ice Barrage Timer [pk planet source, 317]
channel.description: Can anybody tell me how i could make it to where u can only cast ice barrage once every 2 seconds or so? Right now it can basically be casted as fast as the person can click it. Would my best bet be in playerhandler or eventmanager? Any help at all would be appriciated
